title: 2D Magic Gems and Treasure Chests 66 Fantasy Icons in Different Colors
description: Discover a treasure trove of creativity with the 2D Magic Gems and Treasure Chests icon set, featuring 66 unique icons in a variety of color variations.
longDescription:
Discover a treasure trove of creativity with the 2D Magic Gems and Treasure Chests icon set, featuring 66 unique icons in a variety of color variations. Perfect for fantasy-themed games, these detailed and vibrant icons will add a little magic to your project, whether itâ€™s an RPG, adventure game, or puzzle. This collection includes mystical gems and treasure chests that can be used to represent rewards, magic items, power-ups, or collectibles.


Key Features:


66 unique 2D icons, including magic gems and treasure chests in a variety of color schemes.

High resolution (512x512 pixels) ensures crisp and clear visuals for any screen size.

Provided in PNG format with a black background, making it easy to integrate for a variety of game styles and applications.

Suitable for fantasy, RPG, adventure and puzzle games, as well as any project that requires magical resources related to treasures.

The color variants provide a wide range of customization options, giving you flexibility in their use.

How to use:


The icons are designed for easy integration into any game engine.

Perfect for representing items, currencies, collectibles, bonuses or achievements in your game's user interface.

The different color variations make it easy to create different levels of rarity or value for gems and treasures, enhancing the game mechanics.

Specifications:


A total of 66 icons (magic stones and treasure chests).

512x512 pixel resolution for crisp, high-quality images.

PNG format with a black background, ready to import into your project.

Why choose this resource?


With a wide variety of icons and color variations, this set provides plenty of options to give your game a polished, professional look.

Perfect for developers creating fantasy worlds, these icons help set the tone and style of your game with minimal effort.

This is the first version, so you can expect updates with new features and additional content based on user feedback.

Easy Integration: These icons are lightweight and easy to implement, whether you're working on a mobile game or a PC project. Just drag them into the asset folder and they're ready to go!


Feedback and Support: We welcome your feedback! Please consider leaving a review or rating to help us improve and add more content to your projects. For any questions or support, please contact us at olgabutymova27@gmail.com


Start your journey into the world of magic and treasure today with 2D Magic Gems and Treasure Chests - 66 Fantasy Icons in Different Colors!
